hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Aishah that :some people raided the she-camels of the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) , so the Prophet(ﷺ) cut off their hands and feet (on opposite sides) and lanced (gouged out) their eyes

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ حَارَبَ وَسَعَى فِي الأَرْضِ فَسَادًا
chapter.eng-name: Those Who Engage In Banditry and Spread Mischief In The Land
